name: Cootoh
description: Set the mood, chill the good wine, and let Cootoh do the cooking. Cootoh simplifies direct-to-consumer chef experiences for private and corporate events, as well as part-time and seasonal services, allowing you to leave stress at the door and reclaim your most valuable asset--time. Simultaneously, our platform enables talented chefs to break free from the low-paying, high-stress environments of restaurants and thrive as food entrepreneurs.
one_liner: Set the mood, chill the good wine, and let Cootoh do the cooking. Cootoh simplifies direct-to-consumer chef experiences for private and corporate events, as well as part-time and seasonal services, allowing you to leave stress at the door and reclaim your most valuable asset--time. Simultaneously, our platform enables talented chefs to break free from the low-paying, high-stress environments of restaurants and thrive as food entrepreneurs.
